verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on qasam-v

example.parse: ولخط السكة الحديد وطريق موازية قيمة رمزية لانهما سيكونان **-1 اول ما يقطع **-2 المنطقة المنزوعة السلاح التي تقسم **-3 شبه الجزيرة الكورية منذ نهاية الحرب .

arg.g: since the end of the war

frameset.comment: Based on roleset qasam-i.01 Based on roleset qasam-v.01

example.parse: (TOP (S (VP (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يِقسِمُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN_NUM+NSUFF_FEM_SG عَشَرَة))) (PP (SBAR (WHADVP-1 (X (NO_FUNC بحيث))) (S (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (S (NP-TPC (PRON_3MS ُه)) (VP (IV3MS+IV يِفْضَل) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_QUANT كام) (NP (NOUN مُسَلْسَل) (ADJ بَسِيط))))) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يِكُونُوا) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_QUANT كُلّ) (NP (POSS_PRON_3P هُم))) (UCP-PRD (ADJP (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL هادفِين)) (CONJ وِ) (S (PP-PRD (PREP لِ) (NP (PRON_3P هُم))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG قِصَّة)))))))) (ADVP-PRD (-NONE- *T*-1))))))))

arg.g: that he prefers a handful of series with morals to their stories

example.arg: بحيث إِنّه يِفْضَل كام مُسَلْسَل بَسِيط وِيِكُونُوا كُلّهُم هادفِين وِلِهُم قِصَّة

frameset.comment: Based on roleset qasam-i.02 Based on roleset qasam-v.02
